name: Gentleman Wardrobe
description: Gentleman is a wardrobe by architect and designer Guglielmo Ulrich. Ceccotti Collezioni reissues it, staying true to the original design. The frame is in rosewood, the insides in maple, and the handles in ebony and rosewood, while the metal parts are in finely polished brass. The exterior of the doors is covered in parchment. Inside, the wardrobe is spacious and fitted with drawers and a series of accessories designed to meet multiple functional requirements.
